name: Binary Golf
description:
V 0.4.5

A mini-golf game that you can design your own courses, play them and share them to the world.

Still in development, planning on implementing multiplayer (Local PC, LAN or WAN), computer AI and finishing the game.

All physics are math-based (some are simple and some are advanced), so if something strange happened while playing, I'll try to fix it if you report it to me.
